traits.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the operative is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The operative makes three Unarmed Strike attacks, three Cobalt Dart attacks, or a combination thereof.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Cobalt Dart
entries: Ranged atk +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) force damage.
